addCandidate(address,uint256,uint256,uin.details: post an ERC20 token as a candidate for normal support

params.name: tokenOrigAddr name to be used in WanChain
params.symbol: tokenOrigAddr symbol to beused in WanChain

params._newOwner: The address of the new owner. 0x0 can be used to create  an unowned neutral vault, however that cannot be undone

isTokenRegistered(address).details: check if a tokenOrigAddr has been supported

params.tokenOrigAddr: address of tokenOrigAddr to be added

kill().details: destruct SC and transfer balance to owner

setSmgEnableUserWhiteList(address,bool).details: function for setting smg registering mode,control by foundation or registering freely

params.enableUserWhiteList: smg register mode,true controlled by foundation with white list,false register freely

setSystemEnableBonus(address,bool,uint25.details: function for setting current system BonusPeriod

params.isSystemBonusPeriod: smg isSystemBonusPeriod, true controlled by foundation, false register freely

setTokenEconomics(address,uint256,uint25.details: set prams for a supported ERC20 token

params.penaltyReceiver: an address who will receive penalty
params.ratio: coin Exchange ratio,such as ethereum 1 eth:880 WANs,the precision is 10000,the ratio is 880,0000

updateTotalBonus(address,uint256,bool).details: function updating total bonus of a specific ERC20 token

params.isAdded: plus if true, else do a minus operation
